result.speaker: Casan Famhair
lines: I'm one of the last Giants of the Lands-in-Between. The only other folk is that good ol' Ozzie, but he's a big one, unlike me.
As tall as a mountain that Ozzie. Probably why he survived, got mixed up with a mountain, hah!
I came to be respected by all dwarves because of that mother of mine.
Even married one, mind you. Got a daughter, her turn now. She's to be married this day. I'm getting all cleaned up for the event.
